title: Singtom Tea Estate Resort
description: A vegetarian resort in Singtom Tea Estate, situated 20 minutes by car from Darjeeling town. Offering dining service to its guests with vegans catered for. The tea estate produces tea in an ethical, environment-friendly and pure manner, per its motto. 4 luxury suites and other rooms also available nearby. Offers day visits & tea tastings with advance reservation. 4 trekking paths that are part of the resort area. Each of these paths lies between 1000 and 1800 meters in altitude covering a 1600 acre of land with 22 kms of walking distance. Breathtaking views of the great Himalayan peaks, including Kanchenjunga.
